channel.title: Luminosity 667 Loading 706
channel.description:
[img]http://img804.imageshack.us/img804/6899/4f7cd33a9d29c9104600000.png[/img] Current stage: [b]Development[/b] Stages: Development Closed Beta Open Beta Alpha
Dev Team Info: Luminosity Developemnt team will be making a 667 Loading 706. Right now it is a team of 2. (More Soon)
Feaures: New Home [yes] Trade Glitch [50%] Summoning 70% [No] 706 cache put in [Yes] Tutorial and Objects removed [Yes] Potions Both way ( PVP & PVM) [Yes] Newer Items equipable [No] Perfect Combat [No] Malicious Content Code Removed [Yes]
If possible i can get 3 other Developers and a Graphic Designer to help me in the mean while.
Head Developer: Sile (me) Server Developer: kill you704 Client & Server Devloper: Legionscape669 Website Developer: Open Graphic Designer xraviin
Applying Template: [code] Name: Age: Way of Contact: Applying for: Expeirence: Proof of exp: [/code]
Media Content: [img]http://img59.imageshack.us/img59/5333/dd171820a6a4440baaf343b.png[/img] [img]http://img217.imageshack.us/img217/7527/36a0744666214a26a1223d9.png[/img] [img]http://img13.imageshack.us/img13/6039/b8dde855632d4ecbb956920.png[/img]

item.title: Luminosity 667 Loading 706
item.dc:creator: @Chrisl1924 Chrisl1924
item.description:
@Chrisl1924 wrote:

Name: Chris

Age: 15

Way of Contact: (MSN: Clemke1924@gmail.com) (Skype: Clemke1924) (EMAIL: Clemke1924@gmail.com) I am on various social networks and I have xbox live if that is needed.

Applying for: Website Developer

Experience:
-Well, I have been fiddling with various languages for a while now, 2 or 3 years max, about the same time I became really interested in the internet. I can do basically anything and everything with HTML (Although that’s expected), I can incorporate CSS3 as well, and really like working with it. I also throw around some javascript and flash, although I prefer the bread and butter of HTML and CSS.
-As forums go, I can make themes/ layouts for various forums software, and am comfortable in smf, mybb, phpbb, and also online hosted forums like zetaboards. I can use vBulletin up to version 3.8.7, but VB4 has really been giving me a headache, but I am continuing to learn it.
-I enjoy working with websites and forums for private servers because it’s a good topic to focus a community around. I’ve owned my own private server before (Trinitypk, closed, CO- owned Magikscape, also closed) and find it an enjoyable experience, but I do not have time to be a owner as of now.

Proof of exp: I have a very nice rip of the current Runescape site that a few friends and I worked on, as well as some templates and such, but nothing currently uploaded online. I can search my hard drives and see what I can find. If you would like more info, please feel free to message me on Skype, as that is the best way to contact me, or emailing me works great as well.

I will need specifics as to what you need done, but that can come at a later date, but the sooner I get started on this, the sooner it will be up and running!

This server looks like it’s headed in the right direction, and I would love to be a part of it. Thanks much.
(Off Topic- That new logo looks absolutely sexy and I would absolutely LOVE to design a website around that.)

Read full topic

[quote=“xraviin, post:26, topic:438016”]Name: Ravin
Age: 17
Way of Contact: MSN - parekh.ravin@live.com
Applying for: Graphic Designer
Expeirence: 1 year+ of photoshop
Proof of exp: http://anarchy.imgur.com/all/
http://s894.photobucket.com/albums/ac142/rp4b/#!cpZZ1QQtppZZ20

  • Some misc photo’s may be in there, everything else is made by me. It ranges from my shitty ones to my decent ones! *

Thanks[/quote]
Accepted Welcome to the Team… Please Pm me so we can talk

Ruby Forums Coder:

I’m so fed up of seeing 667’s everywhere.

Nice to know… but, tell me… Which ones are not worth doing, The ones people just put up and host need to come down yes… EVERYONE uses PI see me posting about me hating everyone using it?
It’s just a new revision so people can use them if they want… it’s our decision not yours… You can say, “Oh I hate this it looks like something to close to Runescape.” well okay yes it is but, were mostly doing this for Educational Purpose to learn and understand Java Language better…
